title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3003

content.text:
Mr. WAXMAN. Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to have the name of 
the gentleman from Kansas (Mr. Moran) removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 
3003.
content.speaker: Mr. WAXMAN

content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore (Mr. Simpson). Is there objection to the 
request of the gentleman from California?
content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore (Mr. Simpson)

doc_title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3003
